name: Ultimate Spider Hero
description:
Ultimate Spider Hero game was designed for real heroes! Your mission is to help poor residents of the Metropolis and to save them from the terrible monsters. Move forward to fight your enemies and try not to fall!Features:
  • Simple and addictive gameplay
  • Nice graphics
  • Awesome Ultimate Spider Hero
  • Support all platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, SteamOS)

Make your way through the endless maze of city streets together with his favorite hero movies and cartoons. It may not be as simple as it looks at first glance. You need to learn how to properly cling to the house with the web, otherwise death can not be avoided and you simply fall down. But if you learn - you can become a true, elusive superhero, agile and quick, capable, tirelessly jumping across rooftops and skyscrapers of the urban landscape. Treat yourself and your friends this exciting game with nice and simple graphics!
